remarks: The norm of a normed complex vector space is a continuous function to ` CC ` .  (For ` RR ` , see ~ nmcvcn .)  (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nmcnc.1 $e |- N = ( normCV ` U ) $.
nmcnc.2 $e |- C = ( IndMet ` U ) $.
nmcnc.j $e |- J = ( MetOpen ` C ) $.
nmcnc.k $e |- K = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
nmcnc $p |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> N e. ( J Cn K ) ) $.
